Title: Ring of Terror
Writer: Lewis Simeon (original story), Lewis Simeon (screenplay), Jerrold I. Zinnamon (screenplay)
Actors: George E. Mather, Austin Green, Esther Furst, Norman Ollestad
Plot: Med student Lewis Moffitt harbours a secret fear of the dark stemming from a traumatic childhood incident involving a corpse. Nonetheless, he pretends to be unaffected during the first autopsy witnessed by his class, and generally affects an attitude of fearlessness. This, however, inspires his would-be frat brothers to conceive a particularly morbid initiation ritual -- one which will, inevitably, go horribly awry.
